alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 15 at 6:11AM EST until January 16 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River near Oconee affecting Wilkinson, Johnson and Washington Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast to continue. * WHERE...Oconee River near Oconee. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 19 feet, The water level begins to flood the dirt parking lot area near the Old Balls Ferry Road boat ramp...just upstream and rightbank from the Georgia Highway 57 bridge. Minor flooding continues and spreads further into the woodlands near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM EST Monday the stage was 18.6 feet and falling. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:45 AM EST Monday was 20.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.7 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 17 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. this evening at 615 PM EST.
